item.title: [pwnme 2023 - pwn] chip8
item.description: chip8 Solves: 24 Easy I just found a repo of a chip-8 emulator, it may be vulnerable but I didn’t had enough time to report the vulnerability with a working PoC. You must find a way to get the flag in memory on the remote service ! Author: Express#8049 Remote service at : nc 51.254.39.184 1337 chip8 is a emulator-pwn challenge I did during the pwnme CTF . You can find the related files here.
